element.short: The name of a valid referenced CQL expression (may be namespaced) that defines this population criteria
element.definition: The name of a valid referenced CQL expression (may be namespaced) that defines this population criteria.
element.comment: In the case of a continuous variable or ratio measure, this may be the name of a function that calculates the value of the individual observation for each patient or event in the population. For these types of measures, individual observations are reported as observation resources included in the evaluatedResources bundle for each patient. See the MeasureReport resource or the Quality Reporting topic for more information.
